about_the_game:
To all those who wish to know more about the world of ghostpia,

The "ghostpia Season One Art Book" is a cornucopia of ghostpia content, including the striking illustrations from within the story, the rare original character design drafts, internal references documents, and more.

For those who are interested in how the world of ghostpia was portrayed, we've compiled all of this into a single art book in PDF format. Let yourself drift into the story of Sayoko and her friends while looking at an even deeper layer of ghostpia.

Note: The book contains spoilers, so we recommend that you play "ghostopia: Season One" to the end before reading it.

Page count: 60 (56 with content)
File size: about 65 MB

How to open the "ghostpia: Season One Art Book":
1. Download "ghostpia: Season One"
2. In your Steam library, find "ghostpia: Season One", right-click on it and select "Properties"
3. Go to the "DLC" tab and confirm that "ghostpia: Season One Art Book" has been installed
4. In the Properties window, find the "Installed Files" tab, and click on "Browse..."
5. Find and open the "Art book" folder
6. Find the "ghostpia Season One - Art book.pdf" file in the "Art book" folder and open it with your preferred PDF reader application
